resources:
Droid Cafe Donuts are glazed and sprinkled with candy. Ice cream sandwiches have chocolate wafers and vanilla filling. FroYo is premium self-serve frozen yogurt. You ordered a donut. You ordered an ice cream sandwich. You ordered a FroYo.
